Block.Text: {C1}{Color:31}Kai{Color:33}'s story, {Color:32}Simply the Best{Color:33}, has been unlocked!{End}
{C1}{Color:31}Masanori{Color:33}'s story, {Color:32}Not Worth Fighting Over... 3{Color:33}, has been unlocked!{End}

{C1}A Warrior can enter {Color:32}locations{Color:33} like the Shop or the Ponigiri Shop and leave again without buying or selling anything. In such a case, they will not use up their turn.{End}
{C1}Do some {Color:32}training{Color:33} to strengthen the bond between Warriors and Pokémon. {End}
{C1}Go on a {Color:32}search{Color:33} to find Warriors and Pokémon to become your allies.{End}
{C1}Gather gold and invest in locations in order to {Color:32}develop{Color:33} your army and castles. {End}
{C1}{Color:32}Develop{Color:33} your army by raising the Energy of its Pokémon and finding gold. {End}
{C1}Stop {Color:32}delegating{Color:33} to a particular Warrior that you have previously assigned tasks to.{End}
{C1}Do not {Color:32}delegate{Color:33} to a particular Warrior after all.{End}

{C1}You are now able to play Okuni's story, {Color:32}A Date with Destiny{Color:33}. {Color:30}This story becomes available for play only once you have cleared the game.{Color:33}{End}
{C1}You are now able to play Ranmaru's story, {Color:32}A Fate Born of Beauty{Color:33}. {Color:30}This story becomes available for play only once you have cleared the game.{Color:33}{End}

{C1}Stories{End}
{C1}Use wireless features to battle others via local wireless or download data over Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection.{End}

{C1}Select {Color:32}Host{Color:33} to fight using any Warriors from the Gallery on a battlefield that you have selected and using the link settings you have chosen. Select {Color:32}Join{Color:33} to fight using any Warriors from the Gallery with the link settings and battlefield chosen by another player. {End}
{C1}The rules of the game will be set once all the players have assembled.{End}
{C1}Waiting...{End}
{C1}Each team can contain up to two players. When there are fewer than four players, the CPU will fill up the missing places.{End}
{C1}Choose your team.{End}
{C1}Choose a kingdom, then select a battlefield.{End}
{C1}Are you sure you want to do battle in {Area}{C1}?{End}
{C1}Select the Warriors you wish to send into battle. The Pokémon they are currently with can be changed.{End}
{C1}Choose Warriors for the CPU to fight with. The Pokémon they are currently with can be changed.{End}
{C1}Are you sure these are the Warriors you wish to send into battle?{End}
{C1}Begin battle?{End}
{C1}Disconnect?{End}

{C1}Friends found! Those with a symbol next to their names are currently seeking help with various stories.{End}

{C1}Please wait. {End}

{C1}A player has disconnected and will be replaced by the CPU.{End}

{C1}Choose whether to attack or defend.{End}

{C1}Received data from all participating players.{End}
{C1}Host{End}
{C1}Join{End}
{C1}Waiting for confirmation from %s...{End}
{C1}{Color:31}%s{Color:33} is selecting a battlefield...{End}
{C1}Waiting for confirmation from %s...{End}
{C1}Set in a peaceful rural village, this battlefield can get surprisingly intense. Make wise use of the {Color:32}logs{Color:33} to inflict maximum damage on your enemies!{End}

{C1}If you want a battle that's truly sizzling, look no further than an active volcano with {Color:32}pillars of fire{Color:33} shooting up all over the place! And if it all gets to be too much, relax in the {Color:32}hot springs{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}The Warrior who best harnesses the remarkable power of water will decide the victor on this battlefield. Think carefully, and make smart use of the {Color:32}flood gates{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}While nonstop electrical currents pulse around you, the army that controls the {Color:32}switches{Color:33} controls the battlefield!{End}

{C1}Welcome to the most luscious green labyrinth you've ever seen! But you'll need more than just a green thumb to outwit your enemy on this battlefield filled with {Color:32}vines{Color:33} and {Color:32}strange grass{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}Where better to confront your opponent than under a freezing cold sky? Get the better of that slippery {Color:32}ice{Color:33}, and surround your enemy!{End}

{C1}This battlefield is for the tough―weaklings will find their heads spinning! Try to protect the {Color:32}banners{Color:33} as you and your enemy both struggle not to fall off the edge of the ring...{End}
{C1}In this tricky mansion with no shortage of traps and poison, figure out how the hidden passages work and claim the {Color:32}banners{Color:33} before your opponent manages to!{End}
{C1}Journey to a stormy desert that is no stranger to strong {Color:32}gusts of wind{Color:33}! Who will be the one to take control of the three towers, inaccessible even to Flying-type Pokémon?{End}
{C1}In a land so high above the clouds it can't even be seen from the earth, use the {Color:32}jump ramps{Color:33} to spring ahead of your opponent!{End}
{C1}Experience the thrill of battle on a mysterious floating rock! {Color:32}Warp{Color:33} your way around the battlefield, and claim all the {Color:32}banners{Color:33} as your own.{End}
{C1}A Pokémari battle waged in the scenic setting of a delightful traditional garden. Get those {Color:32}Pokémari balls{Color:33} rolling to steal victory from your opponent!{End}

{C1}A strenuous battle fought on the heights of a rocky mountain! As you and your enemy roll {Color:32}rocks{Color:33} at one another, make sure that you're the one who manages to land the crucial hit!{End}
{C1}From suspicious {Color:32}statues{Color:33} to {Color:32}balls of fire{Color:33}, you'll have to accustom yourself to an ever-evolving battlefield in this thrilling match!{End}
{C1}There's no choice but to take on your opponent face-to-face in this one. Be sure to watch out for the changing {Color:32}nodes{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}A dark world of uncertainty and fear... Who knows what awaits you in this hidden battlefield? Consider this your invitation to unbridled chaos...{End}
{C1}In a battlefield brimming with hidden traps, traveling in a straight line will only get you into trouble! Get those {Color:32}cog wheels{Color:33} turning to succeed in this one!{End}
{C1}Unable to connect to Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection. For help, check the software Instruction Booklet or visit support.nintendo.com.{End}

{C1}Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection cannot be used because an error has occurred. Reset the system and try again.{End}

{C1}Connect to Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection?{End}

{C1}Wi-Fi User Information for this Nintendo DSi system has been saved to the save data. From now on, please use this Nintendo DSi system to connect to Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection.{End}
{C1}Unable to connect to Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection because the Wi-Fi User Information from the system and the Game Card do not match.{End}
{C1}Unable to connect to Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection because the Wi-Fi User Information from the Nintendo DSi system and the save data do not match. {End}
{C1}Update Wi-Fi User Information saved on the Game Card? When you update your Wi-Fi User Information, you will lose all data that was used to connect to Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection.{End}

{C1}Link Settings{End}

{C1}The rules for Wireless Battles will now be set. Please select link settings. {C1}Select a {Color:32}number{Color:33} as the maximum link level allowed in the battle. {C1}If you choose {Color:32}none{Color:33}, Gallery data will be used unchanged. {C1}{Color:30}You cannot enter a value that exceeds the maximum link level.{Color:33}{End}

{C1}{Color:31}%s{Color:33} is currently selecting the link settings. {C1}The {Color:32}number{Color:33} they select determines the maximum link level allowed in the battle. {C1}If {Color:32}none{Color:33} is selected, Gallery data will be used unchanged. {C1}{Color:30}The number selected cannot exceed the maximum link level.{Color:33}{End}

{C1}Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves. {End}
{C1}The Pokémon can climb to high places.{End}
{C1}Increases Range on water.{End}
{C1}Increases Range on ice.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon can push an attacking opponent far away with super strength.{End}
{C1}Moves can be used regardless of enemy Abilities. {End}
{C1}Moves can be used regardless of enemy Abilities. {End}
{C1}Moves can be used regardless of enemy Abilities. {End}
{C1}Powers up moves if they become critical hits. {End}
{C1}Reduces damage from supereffective attacks.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon is protected against critical hits. {End}
{C1}The Pokémon is protected against critical hits. {End}
{C1}The Pokémon is protected against 1-hit KO attacks. {End}
{C1}Ignores any stat changes in enemy Pokémon. {End}
{C1}Raises resistance to Fire-type and Ice-type moves.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon is protected from paralysis. {End}
{C1}Prevents the Pokémon from being poisoned. {End}
{C1}Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon is protected from flinching. {End}
{C1}Prevents the Pokémon's stats from being lowered. {End}
{C1}Prevents the Pokémon from losing accuracy. {End}
{C1}Raises Attack if hit by a Fire-type move.{End}
{C1}Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move. {End}
{C1}Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move. {End}
{C1}Raises Speed if hit by an Electric-type move. {End}
{C1}Absorbs all Electric-type moves to raise Attack. {End}
{C1}The Pokémon can evade moves from its allies.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon can parry direct enemy attacks with claws or blades.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon uses intuition to swiftly evade enemy moves.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon can evade direct attacks and knock opponents off balance.{End}
{C1}Contact with the Pokémon inflicts damage on the attacker. {End}
{C1}Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker. {End}
{C1}Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.{End}
{C1}Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker. {End}
{C1}Contact with the Pokémon may freeze the attacker. {End}
{C1}Contact with the Pokémon causes the attacker to flinch. {End}
{C1}Raises Attack when HP is low.{End}
{C1}Raises Attack when HP is low.{End}
{C1}Raises Attack when HP is low.{End}
{C1}Raises Attack when HP is low.{End}
{C1}Raises Attack when suffering from a status ailment.{End}
{C1}Raises Attack and Defense when suffering from a status ailment.{End}
{C1}Raises Speed after flinching.{End}
{C1}Raises Attack if hit by a Dark-type move.{End}
{C1}Restores HP while sleeping.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon falls asleep and recovers HP when HP is low.{End}
{C1}Restores HP and raises Attack when HP is low.{End}
{C1}Restores HP when the Pokémon is standing in magma.{End}
{C1}Restores HP when the Pokémon is standing in water.{End}
{C1}Restores HP when the Pokémon is standing on grass.{End}
{C1}Restores HP when the Pokémon is standing on soil or sand.{End}
{C1}Restores HP when the Pokémon is standing in magma, soil, or sand.{End}
{C1}Restores the HP of nearby allies.{End}
{C1}Restores HP every turn.{End}
{C1}Restores HP when waiting at the end of a turn.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon may heal its own status ailments.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon may heal an adjacent ally's status ailments.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon may heal an adjacent ally's status ailments.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon can attack adjacent enemies in the confusion of battle.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon can absorb the HP of adjacent enemies.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon protects adjacent allies by taking enemy attacks for them.{End}
{C1}Raises Attack and Defense when their army is struggling.{End}
{C1}Raises Attack and Defense when all other allies have been defeated.{End}
{C1}All moves by the Pokémon and their enemy will be successful.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon can evade enemy moves when on their favorite terrain.{End}
{C1}Strengthens attacks carried out at the start of a turn.{End}
{C1}Raises Attack in proportion to distance moved.{End}
{C1}Raises Attack when several Electric-type Pokémon are together.{End}
{C1}Improves Defense on grass.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon's accuracy is boosted.{End}
{C1}Doubles effectiveness of stats changes.{End}
{C1}Raises Attack for 1 turn after defeating an enemy.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon can move again after defeating an enemy.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon can sing nearby enemies to sleep.{End}
